lines: dri med 'od gsal dag pa'i rol gnas las
kun khyab sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i snang brnyan ni
rnam dag dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshul
dus gsum rgyal dbang padma sam b+ha wa
g.yas na dpa' bo'i bro brdung khrabs se khrabs
g.yon na dpa' mo'i glu len sha ra ra
bgrang yas rig 'dzin grub pa'i tshogs kyis bskor
dam can srung ma'i tshogs rnams sprin ltar gtibs
mkhar nyal dbang po'i tshogs rnams rjes 'brang zhing
'chi med bu mo'i lag pad kyis gtor ba'i
man d+ha ra yi phreng bas mkha' lam khyab
tshad med thugs rje'i dbang gis gnas 'dir gshegs
mdun gyi nam mkhar 'dab ma stong ldan pa'i
chu skyes lte bar seng khri nyi zla'i steng
dri med 'od zer lnga yi gur khyim dbus
dgyes pa'i 'dzum chags brtan par bzhugs su gsol
gang gA'i rdul gyi grangs mnyam lus sprul te
yid srubs zol skyes spu long gos ldan zhing
dad pa'i thal sbyar me tog kha 'bus bcas
zhabs rdul spyi bor blangs te gus phyag 'tshal
gser gyi 'dab stong 'khrigs pa'i snod yangs su
'chi med bdud rtsi'i mchod yon mtsho ltar bskyil
yid 'phrog lha dang mi yi me tog rnams
tshig mda'i lam kun khyab par rab 'khrigs shing
'od zer bzhad ldan rin cen snod rnams su
tsan dan sbrul snying lha rdzas a ka ru
bsregs pa'i dud sprin phyogs kyi 'khor lo 'gengs
rab 'bar sgron me'i phreng bas chu mthongs 'gog
ga bur tsan dan gyis sbags gur kun gyi
dri chab yid 'ong rol mtsho ltar 'khyil zhing
zag med bde ster ro brgya'i phun tshogs can
lha dang mi yi zhal zas ma tshang med
gdangs snyan skad kyi 'gyur ba 'bum phrag can
rgyud mangs gling bu dung gi bye brag sogs
'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod pa'i
ma lus zhing kun khyab par byas te 'bul
rin cen lhun po gling bzhi gling phran brgyad
nyi ma zla ba rgyal srid rin cen bdun
lus dang longs spyod 'dod dgu'i gter chen po
dus gsum dge tshogs dang bcas khyod la 'bul
rnyog bral dad pa'i chu gter las 'ongs pa'i
kun bzang mchod sprin mkha' ngos ma lus pa
yongs su khyab pa'ang rgyal sras mchog rnams kyis
dus gsum rgyal ba mchod bzhin legs par mchod
stong gsum khyon ltar yangs pa'i thod pa'i nang
sgron ma lnga dang de bzhin lcags kyu lnga
sbyangs rtogs sbar byas zag med ye shes lnga'i
rang bzhin bdud rtsi rgya mtshor bskyil bas mchod
bdag nyid rje btsun padma thod phreng rtsal
yid 'phrog rang snang sgyu ma'i phyag rgya dang
mnyam par sbyar ba e ma'o bde ba che
smra bsam brjod 'das mchod pa'i mchog 'di rmad
spros pa'i mtshan ma kun bral gdod ma'i gshis
sgrib gnyis 'ching ba las grol lhan cig skyes
brtan g.yo kun khyab kun gyi rang bzhin mchog
dmigs med chos sku'i bdag nyid khyod la 'dud
srid pa'i 'khor lo mgyogs 'gro dbyings su thim
dwangs ma lnga 'dus mtshan dpe'i dra ba can
rgyal sras sar gnas dpa' bo'i mig gi ni
bdud rtsi longs spyod rdzogs pa khyod la 'dud
yongs dag mkha' la shar ba'i ri bong can
brjod 'das dwangs pa'i chu la snang brnyan bzhin
gdul bya'i khams dang bsam pa'i khyad par las
cir yang 'char ba sprul pa'i sku la bstod
o Di ya nar yid bzhin rgya mtsho'i dbus
mtsho skyes las 'khrungs nyes ltung phra mos kyang
ma gos sdom brtson dge slong cha lugs can
ma lus 'gro ba'i skyabs gcig khyod la 'dud
gangs ri'i phreng bas yongs bskor phyogs 'dir yang
zhabs rdul cung zad bkod pa'i bka' drin las
nag phyogs bdud dpung kun zhi rgyal ba'i bstan
'gro ba'i phan bde rgyas mdzad khyod la 'dud
chos skyong chen po sku lnga 'khor dang bcas
khyod kyi bka' dang dam las mi 'da' bar
rgyal ba'i bstan pa srung zhing skyong ba dang
bdag gi bcol ba'i las kun sgrub par mdzod
gdod nas rnam dag don dam mkha' dbyings las
thugs gsung sku dang yon tan 'phrin las bcas
sprul pa'i bka' srung rgyal po sku lnga po
bstan pa bsrung phyir sna tshogs cho 'phrul can
gsang ba'i yum mchog rnams dang blon po'i tshogs
las byed bka' nyan sa dang bar snang kun
yongs gang mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab
dbyar dus char sprin tshogs bzhin dbyings nas bzhengs
rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas mchog nas
ting nge 'dzin gyis bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir
spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol ba'i chos skyong ni
gnod sbyin rgyal po sde lnga 'khor dang bcas
dam tshig gzhung bzhin srung ba'i skyes mchog khyod
thugs dam rgyud bskul gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol
thugs kyi rgyal po brgya byin rgyal po dang
yum chen sha tim ro zan mthu mo che
blon po srog bdag bka' yi bya ra ba
'khor dang bcas pa gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol
'phrin las rgyal po zhal gsum mi bo che
gsang ba'i yum chen bdud gza' smin dkar ma
bka' yi blon po pu tra nag po ste
'khor dang bcas pa gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol
gsung gi rgyal po dgra lha skyes gcig po
gsang ba'i yum chen mdzes byed padma skyes
bka' yi blon po rdo rje grags ldan te
'khor dang bcas pa gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol
yon tan rgyal po gnod sbyin shing bya can
gsang ba'i yum chen gser gyi spu gri ma
bka' yi blon po bya rgod thang nag ste
'khor dang bcas pa gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol
sku yi rgyal po mon bu pu tra ste
gsang ba'i yum chen bdud mo ro langs ma
bka' yi blon po bya khrid mig gcig po
'khor dang bcas pa gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol
dbus phyogs mthing nag 'bar ba'i gzhal yas su
padma nyi ma dgra bgegs bsnol ba'i steng
thugs kyi rgyal po in+d+ra nI la'i mdog
phyag g.yas bdud zhags g.yon pa spu gri 'dzin
dom gyi slog pa dar nag lhab lhub can
dbu la dar nag 'thebs zhu mdzes pa gsol
chu 'dzin g.yo 'dra'i gnyis 'thung sna ring chibs
'khor dang bcas pa brtan par bzhugs su gsol
shar phyogs rab dkar dung gi khang bzang du
sku yi rgyal po pu tra mig sman mdog
gdong lnga la chibs phyag g.yas rdo rje dang
sher shing gseg shang g.yon pa'i phyag gis gsil
'khor dang bcas pa brtan par bzhugs su gsol
lho phyogs gser gyi gzhal med khang chen du
yon tan rgyal po mthing nag rngam pa'i tshul
phyag g.yas dgra sta g.yon pa bdud zhags 'dzin
'jigs rung cho 'phrul du ma'i rol gar can
'khor dang bcas pa brtan par bzhugs su gsol
nub phyogs rab dmar byi ru'i gzhal yas su
gsung gi rgyal po dgra lha skyes gcig ni
padma rA ga'i mdangs can ber dmar can
tsan dan ber 'dzin 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas
'khor dang bcas pa brtan par bzhugs su gsol
byang phyogs rin cen g.yu yi khang bzang du
'phrin las rgyal po dkar nag dmar ba'i zhal
phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po lcags kyu dang
gnyis pa mda' dang gsum pa ral gri 'dzin
g.yon na spu gri 'bar ba lcags gzhu dang
dbyug pa rab 'dzin dar nag cod pan can
dur khrod chas brgyad dar gyi lhab lhub g.yo
seng ge la chibs brtan par bzhugs su gsol
bka' srung chos kyi rgyal po sku lnga po
phung po rnam lnga gdod nas rnam dag cing
dug lnga'i nyon mongs dri ma sbyangs pa las
ye shes lnga yi ngo bor mos phyag 'tshal
bde chen snang ba mtha' yas chos kyi sku
dpal chen rta mgrin khrag 'thung longs spyod rdzogs
mtsho las skyes pa'i rdo rje sprul pa'i sku
sku gsum dbyer med spyan sngar khyod kyis ni
srog gi snying po phul nas bstan pa dang
gtsug lag khang dang dge 'dun sde dang bcas
bsrung zhing dam tshig ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis
bcol ba'i 'phrin las bsgrub par dam bcas bzhin
sngon gyi khas blangs dam bcas ma bsnyel bar
'phrin las rnam bzhi lhun gyis grub par mdzod
chos skyong 'khor bcas rtag tu bsten cing mchod
sman sna stong las sbyar ba'i sman phud ni
ye shes lnga yi ngo bor byin brlabs shing
'dod yon lnga ldan bdud rtsi'i mtshor bskyil nas
rgyal po sde lnga 'khor dang bcas la 'bul
bde chen spros dang bral ba'i mkha' dbyings las
mtha' dag zhing kun khyab pa'i mchod pa'i sprin
zag med ye shes bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa
bka' srung 'khor dang bcas la 'bul ba ni
gzha' tshon ltar bkra'i sham bu g.yo ba can
lha rdzas gos kyi bla re lha lam khyab
in+d+ra nI la'i tog gis rab mdzes shing
gser gyi thur ma stong gi rtsibs ldan pa
rin cen mu tig chun 'phyang mdzes pa can
rnam mang gdugs mdzes tshogs kyi grib bsil dang
lha rdzas dar gyi ba dan stong 'phur cing
rab tu mdzes pa'i rma bya'i rgyal mtshan dang
seng ge stag dang dom dred gzig la sogs
sna tshogs gcan gzan pags pa'i rgyal mtshan tshogs
mnyes pa'i rten rdzas spyan gzigs dam pa 'dis
chos skyong sde lnga 'khor bcas thugs dam bskang
dmar chen khrag gi mchod yon mtsho ltar 'khyil
yid 'ong me tog tshogs kyi lda ldi dang
rin cen 'od 'bar spos snod sna tshogs su
bsregs pa'i dud sprin dri zhim nam mkha'i rgyan
'od zer bzhad ldan gser mchog snod rnams su
rtsi mar dri zhim 'bru mar sna tshogs las
rab 'bar gser gyi mchod sdong phreng ba bzhin
rab mdzes snang gsal tshogs kyis thugs dam bskang
phyogs kun cig car 'gengs pa'i dri bzang can
ga bur thigs pas legs bran tsan dan dang
gur kum la sogs sna tshogs spos kyi chu
kun khyab 'khor lo 'gengs pa'i 'dzum rlabs ni
dal gyis g.yo ba'i dri chab rgya mtsho dang
ro brgya'i zas dang 'chi med bdud rtsi sogs
lha dang mi yi zas la ma tshang med
zag med bde ster zhal zas tshogs rnams kyis
chos skyong chen po 'khor bcas thugs dam bskang
rgyud mangs gling bu rdza rnga rnga bo che
zangs dung la sogs bgrang yas rol mo'i tshogs
brjid cing rna ba'i bcud len rgyas byed pa
lha rdzas rol mo'i tshogs kyis thugs dam bskang
padma rA ga'i mdangs chags rgun chang dang
'bras chang bu ram sbrang rtsi'i chang rnams kyang
rgya mtshor rab bskyil gtsang ma'i gser skyems 'dis
chos skyong sde lnga 'khor bcas thugs dam bskang
nal sogs kha dog mdzes pa'i spu mdog can
rdzu 'phrul bang ldan rin cen sga srab ni
sna tshogs kyis spras cang shes tshogs rnams dang
char sprin lta bur g.yo ba'i rnga zhol can
dkar dang nag po zal zhing kham pa sogs
sna tshogs dar gyi cod pan 'phur lding can
mdzes pa'i zhol g.yag rnams kyis thugs dam bskang
gzhan yang ra dang lug sogs spyan gzigs dang
'bru sna sman sna rin cen rnam pa bdun
dngos bshams yid kyis sprul pa'i mchod pa'i sprin
sa dang bar snang gang bas thugs dam bskang
gser ldan dga' ma ltar yangs snod yangs su
chos dbyings rnam par dag pa'i pho brang nas
chos bzhin sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor thams cad kyi
chos ldan 'phrin las mtha' dag sgrub mdzad pa'i
chos skyong chen po khyod la bdag bstod do
sngon tshe rje btsun padma thod phreng gis
gtsug lag khang gi srung mar bka' bsgos nas
bstan dang bstan 'dzin skyong bar zhal bzhes pa'i
bstan srung chen po khyod la bdag bstod do
tshon brgya nye ba'i dag pa'i shel bzhin du
ngang nyid chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang
sku gsung thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las kyi
sku lnga'i rnam rol cir yang 'char la bstod
zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang mngon spyod kyi
'phrin las mdzad phyir khro chags sgeg pa dang
zhi ba'i nyams kyis rab mdzes sku mdog can
sna tshogs phyag mtshan 'dzin mdzad khyod la bstod
sku yi sprul pas sa gsum cig car 'gengs
gsung gi bzhad sgras sa gsum chem chem g.yo
rdzu 'phrul shugs kyis stong gsum skad cig gis
bskor mdzad dpa' bo khyod la bdag bstod do
bdud dang gnod sbyin klu dang srin mo'i tshul
khro chags sgeg pa'i rnam 'gyur cir yang ston
rgyal po sde lnga'i sku la rab 'khril ma
gsang ba'i yum chen rnams la bdag bstod do
rtag tu chos skyong chen po'i bka' sgrub cing
stobs dang mthu ldan rdzu 'phrul dpag dka' ba
bstan pa skyong zhing bstan pa'i dgra bo rnams
dpal ldan gnod sbyin chen po yang le ber
padma rA ga'i lhun po ltar brjid cing
drag po'i nyi 'od 'bum gyi gzi 'bar ba
lhag lhag me 'od 'bar ba'i bse khrab dang
tsher tsher 'od zer 'phro ba'i bse rmog can
lhab lhab ba dan g.yo ba'i mdung dmar g.yas
khyug khyug dgra bgegs 'ching ba'i zhags pa g.yon
char sprin ltar mdzes rta mchog sngon po chibs
btsan dmar stong dang bdud dang srin po'i tshogs
'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas skad cig gis
dgra bgegs ma lus tshar gcod de la bstod
dgra bcom snang brnyan zhi dul nyan thos tshogs
phur thogs gar 'chams rol ba'i sngags pa'i tshogs
go mtshon thogs pa stag shar dpa' bo'i tshogs
nag mo ral pa g.yengs pa'i bud med tshogs
ru 'dren rnams dang lha srin sde brgyad kyi
'khor tshogs sa dang bar snang nam mkha'i khams
yongs su gang ba'i tshogs la bdag bstod do
rgyal ba kun dngos padma sam b+ha was
khrag 'thung padma dbang chen dkyil 'khor du
sprul pa'i chos skyong chen po khyod bcug nas
dbang bskur dam tshig rdo rje spyi bor bzhag
dam rdzas bdud rtsi zhal du blud nas kyang
bstan dang gtsug lag khang rnams khyod kyis skyongs
rnal 'byor 'phrin las mtha' dag sgrubs shig ces
dam tshig gnyer du gtad pa dgongs mdzod la
rgyal ba'i bstan pa dar zhing rgyas pa dang
bstan la gnod pa'i dgra bgegs ma lus pa
skad cig nyid la thal bar brlag par mdzod
lugs gnyis rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang rtser
bsod nams gser gyi rgyal mtshan mthon po can
dpal ldan 'phrin las bzang po'i ba dan g.yo
srid 'dir ri dbang lta bur zhabs brtan mdzod
gang gi bka' khrims bzang po'i nyi 'od kyis
'dzam gling nor 'dzin ma lus khyab gyur nas
bstan pa'i pad tshal ches cher rgyas pa dang
'gro kun phan bde'i lo tog 'phel bar mdzod
dpal ldan 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bka'
spyi bo'i gzhi la rab bzung nas
A li kA li'i tshigs su bcad
thogs pa med par dbyangs su bsgrags
grub pa'i dbang po'i gar gyis rnam rol ba
srid gsum bla ma padma 'byung gnas kyis
dngos grub kun stsol bgegs kun gzhom par mdzod
lhun grub gdod ma'i gshis las ma g.yos kyang
bstan pa bsrung phyir sna tshogs sprul pa'i gar
cir yang 'char ba sprul pa'i chos rgyal che
'khor dang bcas pa gnas 'dir da tshur spyon
sna tshogs rin cen las grub gzhal yas khang
mu tig tshogs 'bar rin cen ba gam can
ting 'dzin pir gyis bris pa'i pho brang du
padma nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol
dus gsum rgyal dbang padma thod phreng gis
dam tshig rdo rje spyi bor bzhag nas kyang
bstan pa srung dang dam ldan 'phrin las kun
sgrub par bka' bsgos dam bcas dran par mdzod
dam rdzas rgyan gyi gtor ma ri ltar spungs
zag med bdud rtsi'i btung ba mtsho ltar bskyil
phyi nang spyan gzigs sa dang bar snang kun
rgyas par bkang ste 'khor dang bcas la 'bul
zhi rgyas dbang drag 'phrin las bsgrub pa dang
bstan pa bsrung phyir khro chags zhi dang sgeg
nyams brgya'i rol pas rab mdzes rnam 'gyur can
rgyal po sku lnga'i sku la bdag bstod do
khyod zhal nam mkhar mche ba'i chu 'dzin 'khrigs
ljags kyi glog phreng srid gsum za ba bzhin
ha ha'i gad rgyangs hUM hUM 'brug sgra can
khams gsum dbang sdud khyod la bdag bstod do
rang bzhin lhun grub gdod nas spros dang bral
ma bcos rang byung lhan cig skyes pa'i dngos
kun khyab kun gyi rang bzhin cir yang 'char
gnas lugs don gzigs khyod la bdag bstod do
rnam mang yon tan tshogs la mnga' brnyes shing
khyod la mchod bstod bsnyen cing bsgrubs pa las
'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i yon tan kun
phyogs bcur rgyas mdzad khyod la bdag bstod do
zhi rgyas dbang drag rab 'byams 'phrin las kun
dus gsum rgyal bas ji ltar bka' bsgos bzhin
thogs pa med par sgrub mdzad dam tshig can
chos skyong chen po khyod la bdag bstod do
hUM| zag med ye shes bde chen gyi
gang ba'i mchod gtor 'di bzhes la
de ring bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzod
sngon gyi las dang 'phral rkyen las
byung ba'i mi 'dod nyer 'tshe kun
zhi zhing tshe dang bsod nams dang
chab srid phun tshogs rgyas par mdzod
'jig rten gsum na gnas pa yi
zas nor longs spyod thams cad dang
dregs ldan skye bo ma lus pa
skad cig nyid la dbang du sdus
log par sems pa'i dgra dang bgegs
phyogs dang mtshams na gnas pa kun
rdul phran tsam yang ma lus par
skad cig nyid la tshar chod cig
dus gsum rgyal ba'i bstan pa dang
mi dbang chen po'i sku tshe dang
chab srid mnga' thang mtshan jus rnams
phyogs bcur rgyas pa'i bkra shis shog
gangs can bstan pa'i 'byung gnas zhi ba 'tsho
rgyal ba'i dbang po padma thod phreng rtsal
dngos grub gnyis kyi bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs mdzod
mgon de'i bde ba chen po'i chos kyi sku
'gro ba'i don phyir sna tshogs rnam rol can
sgrub pa bka' brgyad lha yi 'khor lo yang
ja dkar bdud rtsi btung ba'i phud kyis mchod
khyad par dus gsum rgyal ba'i bstan srung mchog
mthu stobs rdzu 'phrul dpag par dka' ba can
sprul pa'i chos rgyal chen po 'khor dang bcas
ro brgya'i dpal 'dzin ja dkar mchod pa bzhes
rtag tu sangs rgyas bstan pa srung ba dang
dngos grub rnam bzhi'i bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs shing
ma rungs dgra bgegs thams cad tshar bcad nas
rnal 'byor bsam don thams cad 'grub par mdzod
rig 'dzin dpa' bo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang bcas
thogs med thugs rje'i dbang gis gshegs su gsol
mdun gyi nam mkhar pad sdong yangs pa'i steng
seng khri padma nyi zla'i gdan khri la
yid 'phrog 'ja' tshon sna lnga'i gur khyim dbus
zhabs sen 'od chags brtan par bzhugs su gsol
phyi yi mchod pas sa dang bar snang khengs
nang gi mchod pa zag med bdud rtsi'i mtsho
gsang ba bde chen smra bsam brjod las 'das
'gro ba'i don phyir dgyes bzhin bzhes su gsol
rig 'dzin grub pa'i dbang phyug padma 'byung
lnga brgya'i gtsug rgyan dpal ldan mar me mdzad
rdo rje 'chang dbang blo bzang grags pa'i dpal
sna tshogs sprul pa'i gar mdzad de la 'dud
dpal ldan bstan skyong chen mo 'khor bcas rnams
'phrin las rnam bzhi lhun gyis grub pa dang
chos grwa che 'di dar zhing rgyas par mdzod
oM| gangs ri'i phreng bas yongs bskor yul gyi dbus
dge mtshan bcu ldan skyid shod lung pa'i mthil
spyan ras gzigs dbang gis sprul gtsug lag khang
shAkya'i rgyal po'i pho brang lha sa zhes
phyogs bcu'i skye bo 'jig rten phun tshogs kun
ma tshang med par 'du ba'i rlung lha'i phyogs
sngon rabs dam pa'i zhabs sen bkod pa'i gnas
dan 'bag ces bya'i sa yi thig ler ni
bgrang yas mkhas pa'i skye bos rab bsten pa
blo gsal 'dus pa rgya mtsho'i bsti gnas mchog
bshad sgrub bstan pa'i 'byung gnas 'bras spungs zhes
grags pa'i ba dan dkar po phyogs bcur g.yo
chos grwa chen po'i byang ri'i lhun po ni
rtsa ba rab brtan gser gyi gzhi la gnas
rtse mo mtho ba mkha' la bsnyegs pa bzhin
mdzes shing lhun chags rma ri rab 'byams zhes
ming du chags pa'i spo la rab brten pa'i
rin cen lnga las grub pa'i gzhal med khang
mu tig tshogs 'bar zla shel ba gam can
de na bstan srung chen mo 'khor bcas bzhugs
b+h+yo| sngon tshe slob dpon chen po'i spyan snga ru
rgyal ba'i bstan dang bstan 'dzin skyong ba dang
'phrin las rnam bzhi bsgrub par khas blangs bzhin
thogs med rdzu 'phrul dang bcas deng 'dir gshegs
bka' nyan las byed gtso mo gsum dang bcas
sman mo 'bum sde'i tshogs rnams nye re re
rin cen gser g.yu'i rgyan cha sil li li
'jam mnyen dar gyi na bza' lhubs se lhubs
sil snyan rol mo sna tshogs khrol lo lo
dri zhim spos kyi dud pa thul lu lu
snyan pa'i glu len mdzes pa'i gar stabs kyis
rnam rol du mas gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol
sngon tshe slob dpon chen po'i spyan snga ru
bstan dang bstan 'dzin skyong bar khas blangs bzhin
bod khams skyong mdzad bstan ma bcu gnyis po
thams cad 'khor tshogs dang bcas gnas 'dir gshegs
rang gi mdun du sgrub pa'i maN+Dal dbus
ting 'dzin pir gyis bris pa'i gzhal yas su
dar zab kyis g.yogs rin cen gdan khri la
bstan pa skyong mdzad gangs ri'i dbang po bzhin
rab mdzes phyag g.yas me long zhags pa dang
g.yon pa 'gugs byed lcags kyu dar snas brgyan
shwa ba la chibs brtan par bzhugs su gsol
khyod kyi sku yi pho nya dung g+ha bza'
phyag g.yas lcags kyi bya khrag dgra la 'gyed
g.yon pa zor bas dam nyams srog rtsa gcod
yu mo la chibs g.yas su bzhugs su gsol
gsung gi bka' nyan ma g+ha bza' zhes pa
re lde gyon zhing sre long phreng ba g.yas
g.yon pa dar mdung dgra bo'i snying la 'debs
dre'u rta la chibs g.yon du bzhugs su gsol
thugs kyi pho nya shel bza' sman gcig ma
phyag g.yas dngul gzhong zas kyis gang ba dang
g.yon pas dar gyi lhab lhub g.yob byed ma
'brong g.yag la chibs mdun du bzhugs su gsol
gzhan yang mched mo bstan ma'i tshogs rnams dang
sman mo bdud dang btsan dmar 'bum sde'i tshogs
rnal 'byor 'phrin las bsgrub phyir brtan par bzhugs
lhun grub chos dbyings bde ba chen po'i dngos
rnam pa re ba skong byed mthun pa'i rdzas
dngos bshams yid kyis sprul pa'i mchod pa'i sprin
nam mkha'i khams kun bkang ste 'bul ba ni
rin cen gser dngul 'od 'bar snod yangs su
'bras chang rgun chang nas kyi chang phud sogs
mtsho ltar rab bskyil gtsang ma'i gser skyems 'dis
bstan skyong chen mo 'khor dang bcas pa mchod
tsan dan shug pa a ka ru la sogs
dri zhim ngad ldang spos sna brgya phrag tshogs
bsregs pa'i dud sprin nam mkha'i khams gang bas
dam tshig gzi ldan 'bar ma 'khor bcas bsangs
rin cen sga srab mdzes pa'i dar sna can
shwa ba dung gi r+wa bcu zengs se zengs
sprin dkar g.yo 'dra'i rta mchog glog ltar 'gyu
'jam pa'i spu ldan shel ltar 'tsher ba'i lug
'ja' tshon ltar bkra'i rgyan ldan ra skyes tshogs
g.yu bya phug ron tshogs rnams zlos gar sgyur
khu byug myos pa'i sgra 'byin ling ling g.yo
bya nag srin bya'i tshogs rnams zlos gar sgyur
skad snyan bye'u sna tshogs glu dbyangs len
mdzes pa'i spyan gzigs rnams kyis thugs dam bskang
ja chang phud sogs btung ba rgya mtshor bskyil
ro brgya'i zas sogs zas sna sna tshogs dang
'bru sna'i spod sogs bca' ba'i bye brag dang
dkar gsum mngar gsum gtsang ma'i phud kyis mchod
lha rdzas me tog tshogs kyis bar snang 'khrigs
rab 'bar sgron me'i phreng ba tshar du dngar
gdangs snyan skad kyi 'gyur ba brgya phrag can
sil snyan rol mo'i bye brag kun kyang 'bul
stong gsum khyon ltar rin cen snod yangs su
ri rab lta bur spungs pa'i gtor ma ni
oM AH hUM gis bdud rtsir byin brlabs nas
bstan skyong chen mo 'khor bcas zhal du 'bul
bstan pa skyong mdzad dpal ldan yang g+ha bza'
gsang mtshan dam tshig gzi ldan 'bar ma ste
rma ri rab 'byams rdo rje grags mo rgyal
rgyal ba'i bstan srung chen mo khyod la bstod
khyod sku rab dkar shel gyi ljon pa bzhin
lhab lhub dar dang rin cen rgyan phreng g.yo
rin cen dbu rgyan 'phur lding cod pan can
chos 'khor skyong mdzad dpal mo khyod la bstod
sku gsung thugs kyi bka' nyan gtso mo gsum
dam tshig ldan pa'i mched gyur bstan ma'i tshogs
las byed sde brgyad bdud mo sman mo'i tshogs
sa dang bar snang gang ba rnams la bstod
dam tshig gzi ldan 'bar ma 'khor bcas kyis
dam rdzas mchod gtor rgya mtsho 'di bzhes la
dam tshig ldan pa'i rnal 'byor bdag cag gi
dam las ma 'da' bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzod
dpal ldan 'bras spungs chos kyi sde chen po
srid mtha'i bar du dar zhing rgyas pa dang
blo gsal mkhas mang rtag tu 'du ba dang
bshad sgrub yar ngo'i zla ltar 'phel bar mdzod
phyogs bcu'i dad ldan skye bo ma lus dang
phun tshogs dpal 'byor thams cad dbang du sdus
bdag cag dpon slob 'khor dang bcas rnams kyi
bdag cag dpon slob dgon gnas bcas pa la
nye bar 'tshe ba'i sems 'chang dgra dang bgegs
ltas dang cho 'phrul tshogs kyis spa bkong la
rkyen dang 'tsham par myur du tshar chod cig
mdor na dpon slob padma 'byung gnas dang
gnubs chen sangs rgyas ye shes nas bzung ste
rtsa brgyud bla ma'i spyan sngar khas blangs pa'i
dam las ma 'da' bcol ba'i 'phrin las sgrubs
nga ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin
srid gsum dgra bgegs kun gyi gshed
khro bo'i dbang po rta mchog dpal
de ring bstan skyong tshogs rnams la
dam tshig 'phrin las gnyer du gtod
bstan skyong rdo rje grags mo rgyal
sku gsung thugs kyi g.yog mor bcas
bsam yas dpal gyi mchims phu ru
slob dpon padma 'byung gnas kyis
rta mgrin khrag 'thung sku 'khor du
dbang bskur bka' dang dam la bzhag
de tshe gsang ba'i mtshan btags pa
rdo rje dam tshig gzi ldan 'bar
de nas sgrags kyi yang rdzong du
gnubs chen sangs rgyas ye shes kyis
gshin rje'i gshed kyi dkyil 'khor du
dbang bskur bka' dang dam la bzhag
de nas dpal gyi phug pa ru
slob dpon gnyan chen dpal dbyangs kyis
yang dag sgrub pa'i dkyil khor du
bka' bsgos dam tshig gnyer du gtad
de ltar rtsa brgyud bla ma yis
bka' bsgos rang gis khas blangs pa'i
dam tshig gnyan po dran gyis la
nam mkha' gang ba'i spyan gzigs dang
dam rdzas mchod gtor 'di bzhes la
bcol ba'i las 'di myur du sgrubs
dpal ldan rdo rje grags mo rgyal
gong gsum skyong ba'i sman gcig ma
gsang mtshan rdo rje gzi ldan 'bar
mthu stobs dbang phyug yang g+ha bza'
khyod nyid dgra la khros pa'i tshe
chibs su glog phreng 'bar ba chibs
kha nas bskal pa'i me dpung 'phro
shangs nas dud sprin thul lu lu
rjes su me dpung 'bar ba khrid
mkha' la glo bur chu 'dzin 'khrigs
'brug sgra drag po phyogs bcur sgrog
gnam lcags ser chen drag tu 'bebs
sa gzhi me dang chu yis 'gengs
bdud bya skyung ka lings se ling
bya nag mchu ser thibs se thib
sman mo'i shon skror khrigs se khrigs
bdud dmag mang po nyer re re
btsan gyi rta rgyug sha ra ra
dga' na rgya mtsho mkha' la skyel
khros na nyi zla thang la 'bebs
bgad na ri rab phye mar 'thag
de lta'i mthu rtsal cho 'phrul can
'khor dang bcas pa khyed rnams kyis
sangs rgyas bstan pa la gnod cing
dge 'dun sde rnams dkrug cing 'joms
skye bo yongs la gnod sems can
khyad par dgon gnas 'di nyid dang
rnal 'byor bdag cag 'khor bcas la
sdang zhing gdug pa'i bsam pa can
mi dang mi min dgra bgegs rnams
ltas dang cho 'phrul sna tshogs pas
'jigs shing skrag nas spa bkong la
lo dang zla bar ma bzhag par
snying khrag dron mo myur du 'thung
da lta nyid du rlag par gyis
gdug can dam nyams dgra bo 'di
gnyen 'khor phun tshogs kun dang phrol
skyob pa'i lha dpon rnams dang phye
zas nor longs spyod nyams su chug
bdun rgyud tshun chad rlag par gyis
bcol ba'i las 'di ma bsgrubs na
slob dpon chen po'i bka' dang 'gal
rang gi dam tshig khas blangs nyams
rnal 'byor bdag gi re ba bcad
de bas dam tshig ma bsnyel bar
bcol ba'i 'phrin las myur du sgrubs
sngon tshe khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang dbang dang
padma 'byung gnas spyan sngar zhal bzhes bzhin
dpal ldan lha mo rdo rje g.yu sgron ma
'khor bcas bstan pa bsrung phyir gshegs su gsol
dang po'i brten sa u rgyan gnas mchog ste
bar du rdo rje gdan gyi srung ma mdzad
bal bod mtshams gnas bod khams thams cad du
dus kyi mtha' 'dir khyod kyi brten pa'i gnas
lha dang bla ma mkha' 'gros byin brlabs shing
dam can srung ma sprin bzhin 'du ba yi
bkra shis lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang
da lta chos 'khor rgyal gyi srung ma ste
gnas 'dir bshad sgrub bstan pa spel ba dang
dge 'dun sde rnams dar zhing rgyas pa'i phyir
'khor bcas thogs pa med par gshegs su gsol
'ja' 'od gur khyim 'khrigs pa'i pho brang du
lha mo he la 'bar ma gangs ri'i mdog
phyag g.yas mda' dar g.yon pa bum pa bsnams
rma bya'i sgro thul dar gyi lhab lhub dang
rnam mang rin cen rgyan gyis mdzes pa can
zhi khro chags dang sgeg pa'i rnam 'gyur ni
sna tshogs ston mdzad gnas 'dir brtan par bzhugs
de yi g.yas su rdo rje chos sgron ma
dkar mo 'dzum bcas thod pa'i rnga chung g.yas
g.yon pa mdzes pa'i gar stabs sgyur mdzad ma
dre'u rta la chibs brtan par bzhugs su gsol
g.yon na rdo rje sna yon mig sman mdog
phyag g.yas lcags kyus dgra bo'i snying 'byin cing
g.yon pa zor bas dam nyams srog rtsa gcod
gtum drag shwa ba la chibs brtan par bzhugs
'khor du gnas gsum mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams dang
bod khams skyong mdzad bstan ma 'khor dang bcas
dregs pa sde brgyad 'khor tshogs rgya mtshor bcas
gnas 'dir bstan pa spel phyir bzhugs su gsol
bde stong dbyer med nam mkha'i klong yangs las
byung ba'i mchod sprin rgya mtsho 'bul ba ni
dri zhim spos kyi dud pas nam mkha' gang
ro brgya'i gser skyems btung ba mtsho ltar bskyil
sna tshogs rol mo'i bye brag mtha' yas pas
bka' srung chen mo 'khor bcas thugs dam bskang
sman sna stong las sbyar ba'i sman phud dang
'bru sna sna tshogs rin cen rnam lnga'i tshogs
phye mar spos dkar sha chen dud sprin dang
dmar chen rak+ta'i tshogs kyis thugs dam bskang
dar gyi cod pan 'phur lding zhol g.yag dang
mdzes pa'i spyan gzigs tshogs kyis thugs dam bskang
'ja' tshon ltar bkra'i rgyan ldan ra dang lug
mda' dar me long dung sho dkar pos brgyan
'dod dgu'i dpal ster brjid pa'i ri rab bcas
rten rdzas dam pa rnams kyis thugs dam bskang
sa chen khyon ltar yangs pa'i thod pa'i nang
bkod mdzes ri rab lta bu'i gtor ma'i tshogs
sngags dang phyag rgyas bdud rtsir byin brlabs nas
bka' srung chen mo 'khor bcas zhal du 'bul
u rgyan yul du gnas gsum mkha' 'gro'i gtso
rdo rje gdan du gtsug lag khang skyong ma
bod khams skyong mdzad bstan ma yongs kyi gtso
dpal ldan rdo rje g.yu sgron khyod la bstod
rab mdzes sgeg ldem lha mo'i skur ston cing
res 'ga' rab khros srin mo'i gzugs kyis kyang
ma rungs dgra bgegs tshar gcod khyod la bstod
rdo rje chos kyi sgron ma gangs ri'i mdog
thod pa'i rnga chung gar stabs phyag rgya can
rdo rje sna yon srin mo khros pa'i gzugs
las byed bka' nyan gtso mo gnyis la bstod
dngos grub char ltar 'bebs mdzad mkha' 'gro'i tshogs
rnal 'byor bu bzhin skyong mdzad bstan ma dang
dgra bgegs thal bar rlag byed sde brgyad tshogs
dam can 'khor tshogs rgya mtsho'i tshogs la bstod
dpal ldan he la 'bar ma drag shul can
ming po klu chen rdo rje 'bar ba dang
bka' nyan gtso mo gnyis dang 'khor tshogs bcas
dam rdzas rgyan gyi gtor ma 'di bzhes la
rdo rje 'chang dang padma thod phreng gi
spyan sngar khas blangs dam tshig rjes dgongs te
rgyal ba'i bstan pa dar zhing rgyas pa dang
bstan la gnod pa'i dgra bgegs tshar gcod mdzod
khyad par rnal 'byor dpon slob 'khor bcas dang
dgon gnas dge 'dun sde dang gtsug lag khang
nye bar mkho ba'i nor rdzas longs spyod tshogs
ma lus srung zhing rgyas pa'i gnyer mdzod cig
nad gdon bar chad nyer 'tshe zhi ba dang
tshe dang bsod nams bshad sgrub rgyas pa dang
sa 'og sa steng sa bla'i skye 'gro kun
ma lus dbang du bsdu ba'i 'phrin las mdzod
dpon slob dgon gnas 'di nyid bcas pa la
gnod pa'i sems 'chang dgra dang bgegs rnams kun
rkyen dang 'tsham par myur du tshar chod la
bsam don yid bzhin 'grub pa'i 'phrin las mdzod
sngon gyi bskal pa'i dang po la
rgya gar yul du byon pa'i tshe
u rgyan yul gyi mkha' 'gro ma
mnga' ris stod du byon pa'i tshe
'bum gzan la rgyal zhes kyang grags
dkar chung srung mar gshegs pa'i tshe
padma gar gyi dbang phyug ma
he la 'bar ma sham sngon can
las mkhan rdo rje sna yon ma
rdo rje g.yu sgron zhes kyang grags
lha khang srung mar gshegs pa'i tshe
mtshan ni rdo rje g.yu sgron ma
ma gcig jo mo dkor bdag ma
sku mdog dkar dmar 'bar ba la
dbu la g.yu yi thod chings gsol
sku la dar dkar na bza' gsol
phyag na gser gyi bum pa bsnams
rked la dngul dkar me long btsugs
chibs su g.yu dre sngon mo chibs
g.yu yi sga srab khrol lo lo
mdzes pa'i gsung snyan 'tsher re re
'phags pa byang chub tshul khrims kyis
bka' dang dam la btags pa bzhin
sgrub pa po yi grogs mdzod la
rgyu sbyor 'khor bcas bar chad sol
mchog dang thun mong dngos grub stsol
bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod
de nas rgya gar chos kyi rgyal po'i sras
ti ti zhang gi sman gcig ces su grags
de nas zhang zhung yul du khyod 'khrungs te
'phrul ting shag gi sman gcig ces bya la
de nas dge mtshan bcu ldan kong yul gyi
lha yi rje rgyal khrom la zhes bya dang
yum ni lha lcam sman rgyal 'dus pa'i sras
kong btsun de mo rdo rje bod khams skyong
rang gi mched mo bstan ma'i tshogs rnams dang
bka' nyan sde brgyad 'khor tshogs rgya mtshor bcas
dus gsum sangs rgyas padma thod phreng gi
spyan sngar zhal bzhes dam tshig rjes dgongs la
sangs rgyas bstan pa dar zhing rgyas pa dang
rnam dag dge 'dun sde rnams 'phel ba dang
ming po bdag gi zhi rgyas dbang drag gi
las rnams bsgrub phyir gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol
dpal ldan bstan skyong chen mo khyod nyid kyi
phyi nang gsang ba'i sgrub tshul rnam gsum las
phyi sgrub bdud mo khros pa'i skur bstan pa
sgrub pa'i maN+Dal dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus
nam mkha'i mdog can phyag g.yas ral gri dang
g.yon pa nad rkyal dar zab na bza' dang
gser g.yu'i rgyan phreng mchog gis mdzes pa can
dre'u rta la chibs bdud mo 'bum sdes bskor
nang sgrub gnod sbyin mo ltar sgrub pa'i tshe
sku mdog dkar mo nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan
phyag g.yas bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa ni
nor bus mtshan pas sgrub la dngos grub stsol
chibs su kong rta gro dkar rdzu 'phrul can
las sgrub gnod sbyin 'bum gyi 'khor gyis bskor
gsang ba mkha' 'gro lta bur sgrub pa'i tshe
mkha' 'gro chen mo rdo rje dpal 'bar ma
padma rA ga'i mdangs can phyag g.yas na
snang srid thams cad gsal ba'i me long dang
g.yon pa lcags kyus khams gsum dbang du sdud
mkha' 'gro 'bum sde'i tshogs bcas brtan par bzhugs
bde chen ye shes rol mtsho g.yo ba'i rlabs
rnam pa re ba skong byed mchod pa'i rdzas
sa dang bar snang nam mkha'i khyon bkang ste
dam can 'khor dang bcas la 'bul ba ni
dri 'dzin tshim byed bzang po'i dri bzang can
rnam mang spos kyi dud sprin mkha' la dkrigs
rab 'bar 'od can rin cen snod yangs su
phun tshogs gser skyems mtsho ltar bskyil bas mchod
dri med dwangs shing bsil ba'i mchod yon dang
dri zhim ngad ldan tsan dan gur kum sogs
sbyar ba'i dri chab rin cen snod du gtams
ro brgya'i zhal zas tshogs dang lha dang mi'i
bza' dang bca' ba'i khyad par rmad byung kun
dri za'i pi wang lha yi gling bu sogs
rna bar snyan pa'i rol mo'i bye brag rnams
bstan pa skyong mdzad 'khor dang bcas la 'bul
gser g.yu mu tig mu men la sogs pa
rnam mang rin cen tshogs dang 'bru sna'i tshogs
dung dkar phreng ba mda' dar me long bcas
rlung ltar 'phyo ba'i rta mchog dre'u'i tshogs
'phur lding gar byed mdzes pa'i bya tshogs dang
'ja' tshon ltar bkra'i dar gyi cod pan can
'jam pa'i spu ldan lug dang ra skyes tshogs
char sprin lta bur mdzes pa'i rnga zhol can
stobs ldan zhol g.yag tshogs kyis thugs dam bskang
nor 'dzin khyon ltar yangs pa'i rin cen gyi
snod du 'chi med ri bo ltar spungs pa'i
dam rdzas rgyan gyi gtor ma dam pa 'di
zag med bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs te 'bul
sngon tshe u rgyan yul gyi mkha' 'gro'i gtso
bar du 'phags yul chos kyi srung ma mdzad
tha ma'i dus 'dir bod khams skyong mdzad pa'i
dpal ldan rdo rje dpal 'bar khyod la bstod
res 'ga' dkar zhing brjid pa lha mo'i gzugs
skabs 'gar mthing nag khro zhing rngam pa'i tshul
la lar mkha' 'gro dmar mo chags pa'i nyams
sku yi rnam 'gyur cir yang ston la bstod
longs spyod 'dod dgu'i dpal ster gnod sbyin tshogs
dngos grub char ltar 'bebs pa'i mkha' 'gro dang
dgra bgegs rlag byed bdud mo'i tshogs la sogs
rnam mnga' 'khor tshogs rgya mtshor bcas la bstod
bod khams skyong mdzad bstan ma bcu gnyis dang
khyad par bstan pa srung la mthu rtsal can
kong btsun de mo rdo rje bod khams skyong
las byed 'khor tshogs rgya mtshor bcas rnams kyis
dam rdzas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gtor ma dang
ja chang phud dang sman rAga rgya mtshor 'khyil
mdzes pa'i spyan gzigs dam pa 'di bzhes la
slob dpon chen po'i spyan sngar khas blangs pa'i
zhal bzhes dam tshig gnyan po rjes dgongs te
rgyal ba'i bstan pa dar zhing rgyas pa dang
dge 'dun sde rnams 'phel zhing bshad sgrub kyi
bya ba yar ngo'i zla ltar rgyas par mdzod
khyad par rnal 'byor dpon slob 'khor bcas kyi
mi mthun rkyen dang bar chad zhi ba dang
tshe dang bsod nams dpal 'byor rgyas pa dang
snang srid thams cad dbang du bsdu bar mdzod
rgyal ba'i bstan dang bstan 'dzin la 'khu zhing
rnal 'byor bdag la sdang ba'i dgra bgegs rnams
rnam mang ltas dang cho 'phrul bstan nas kyang
skad cig nyid la thal bar rlag par mdzod
sngon tshe rje btsun padma 'byung gnas kyi
spyan sngar bstan ma bcu gnyis rang rang gi
srog gi snying po phul nas khas blangs pa'i
dpal ldan u rgyan yul gyi mkha' 'gro ma
'phags pa'i yul du bstan pa srung mdzad ma
kong btsun de mo rdo rje bod khams skyong
'khor dang bcas pa gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol
mdun gyi nam mkhar bstan skyong chen mo ni
zhi rgyas dbang drag cha lugs sna tshogs can
rang gi mched mo bstan ma'i tshogs dang bcas
rnal 'byor 'phrin las bsgrub phyir brtan par bzhugs
mdzes pa'i spyan gzigs nam mkha'i khyon gang zhing
dam rdzas gtor ma ri ltar spungs pa dang
zag med gser skyems bdud rtsi mtsho ltar bskyil
rgyal ba'i bstan srung chen mo khyod la 'bul
mdzes shing yid 'phrog sgeg ldan lha mo'i gzugs
res 'ga' sgeg cing brjid pa'i nyams dang ldan
dgra bgegs gdul phyir drag mo'i gzugs su ni
ston mdzad 'khor tshogs dang bcas khyod la bstod
chos kyi grwa 'dir tshul khrims la gnas nas
thos bsam lhur len bdag cag grogs mched rnams
'gal rkyen bar chad nyer 'tshe las srung zhing
mthun rkyen bzhed pa'i don kun 'grub par mdzod
! rgyal ba'i dbang po padma 'byung gnas kyis
bka' dang dam la btags pa'i mthu rtsal can
chos skyong chen po 'khor dang bcas rnams kyis
nam mkha' gang ba'i mchod gtor 'di bzhes la
sngon tshe slob dpon chen po'i spyan snga ru
ji ltar zhal bzhes dam tshig rjes dgongs te
rnal 'byor bdag cag 'khor dang bcas rnams kyi
phyi nang 'gal rkyen bar chad thams cad sol
log par lta ba'i dgra dang bgegs rnams kun
mthu stobs chen pos myur du tshar chod la
chab srid mtshan jus dpal 'byor longs spyod rnams
rtag tu 'phel zhing rgyas pa'i 'phrin las mdzod
gnas 'dir mnga' thang rigs rgyud 'phel bar mdzod
mgon des bod khams phan bde 'byung ba'i gzhi
zan yang mi 'gyur lhun gyis grub la sogs
gtsug lag khang kun srung bar mnga' gsol ba'i
chos skyong chen po khyod la bdag bstod do
mtha' bral chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang
'phrin las rnam bzhis bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir
sku lnga'i rnam rol sna tshogs ston mdzad pa'i
bstan srung chen po khyod la bdag bstod do
gang la mchod bstod bsnyen sgrub lhur blangs na
dpag bsam shing dang bum bzang nor bu ltar
'dod dgu'i dngos grub char bzhin 'bebs mdzad pa'i
bsam 'phel dbang gi rgyal por bdag bstod do
sprul pa'i chos rgyal chen po 'khor bcas kyis
sa dang bar snang gang ba'i spyan gzigs dang
mi yi dbang po mched gyur yum sras rnams
srid 'dir sku tshe rab tu brtan pa dang
rigs kyi thig le yar ngo'i zla ba ltar
'phel bas 'dzin ma'i khyon ni gang bar mdzod
gling bzhi'i dpal la 'dod dgur dbang sgyur ba'i
gser gyi 'khor los sgyur rgyal ji bzhin du
phun tshogs yon tan ldan pa'i sras stong dang
ldan pa'i mnga' thang chab srid brtan par mdzod
sngon gyi khas blangs dam bca' ma bsnyel bar
tshe ring mched lnga bstan ma bcu gnyis bcas
rnam mang 'khor tshogs dang bcas gnas 'di ru
tshur spyon tshur spyon myur du gshegs su gsol
dpal ldan bkra shis tshe ring sku mdog dkar
phyag g.yas rdo rje g.yon pa bum pa 'dzin
chibs su seng ge dkar mo chibs nas kyang
tshe dang srid kyi dpal 'byor rgyas par mdzod
snang gsal pra ston mthing gi zhal bzang ma
phyag g.yas ba dan g.yon pa me long 'dzin
mdzes brjid sku mdog sngon mo rkyang la chibs
rnam mang 'khor tshogs dang bcas khyod la bstod
zas kyi dpal ster mi g.yo blo bzang ma
stag la chibs shing lhab lhub dar gyis mdzes
sku mdog ser mo phyag g.yon ne'u le dang
g.yas pas zas kyi gzhong pa 'dzin la bstod
nor gyi mchog ster cod pan mgrin bzang ma
padma rA ga'i mdangs chags shwa yu chibs
phyag g.yas dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i nor bu dang
g.yon pa gter gyi sgrom bu 'dzin la bstod
rkang bzhi phyugs kyi dngos grub kun stsol ba
gtad dkar 'gro bzang sngo ljang mar gad mdog
'brug la chibs shing phyag g.yas dur ba dang
g.yon pa sprul gyi zhags pa 'dzin la bstod
gnam mtsho phyug mo la gnas gsang ba'i mtshan
bdag nyid chen mo rdo rje kun grags ma
sku mdog sngon mo 'brug la chibs pa
ste| |chu srin rgyal mtshan me long 'dzin la bstod
lho bod mtshams na bzhugs pa gsang ba'i mtshan
dpal ldan lha ri rdo rje g.ya' ma skyong
gser gyi mdog can rkyang la chibs mdzad ma
shang lang dang ni zhags pa 'dzin la bstod
la phyi'i gangs la bzhugs pa gsang ba'i mtshan
gangs kyi yum chen rdo rje kun tu bzang
sku mdog dmar mo chibs su seng ge chibs
rdo rje dang ni bum pa 'dzin la bstod
yar 'brog mtsho chen la gnas gsang ba'i mtshan
'brog chen 'khor 'dul rdo rje bgegs kyi gtso
sku mdog sngon mo dre'u chibs nas kyang
ru mtshon rtse lnga zhags pa 'dzin la bstod
lha phu gangs la gnas pa gsang ba'i mtshan
gangs dkar sha med rdo rje spyan gcig ma
sku mdog dkar mo chibs su shwa ba chibs
gser gyi zor ba bum pa 'dzin la bstod
ru mtshams jo mo kha rag gsang ba'i mtshan
kha rag khyung btsun rdo rje dpal gyi yum
sku mdog ser mo mkha' lding dbang po chibs
DA ma ru dang me long 'dzin la bstod
byang stong dong dmar mtsho bdag gsang ba'i mtshan
gser chen mkha' la lding ba rdo rje'i glu
sku mdog dmar mo gyi ling rta la chibs
par bu dang ni sbrul zhags 'dzin la bstod
rma chen spom ra'i drung gnas gsang ba'i mtshan
rma ri rab 'byams rdo rje grags mo rgyal
sku mdog ljang gu chibs su 'phar ba chibs
be con dang ni mkhar gzhon 'dzin la bstod
kong yul dre sna gdong gnas gsang ba'i mtshan
kong btsun de mo rdo rje bod khams skyong
sprin gseb rlung bskyod res dga' rta la chibs
dkar mo mda' dar sgrom bu 'dzin la bstod
a gnyal lo ro'i gnas bdag gsang ba'i mtshan
btsan la lo ro rdo rje sman gcig ma
sku mdog ser mo mdzo mo chibs su chibs
lhab lhub dar dang 'brang rgyas 'dzin la bstod
gtsang stod jo mo nags rgyal gsang ba'i mtshan
sman btsun ug chos rdo rje g.yar mo sil
sku mdog dmar mo shwa ba yu mo chibs
rin cen 'bar ba ting shag 'dzin la bstod
jo mo g.yu ri la gnas gsang ba'i mtshan
g.yu yi rdo rje dril bu gzugs legs ma
sku mdog sngon mo stag la chibs pa ste
padma dang ni dril bu 'dzin la bstod
tshe ring mched lnga bstan ma bcu gnyis bcas
sngon gyi khas blangs dam bcas ma bsnyel bar
dam rdzas rgyan gyi mchod gtor 'di bzhes la
sangs rgyas bstan pa gnyan po srung ba dang
rnal 'byor bdag cag 'khor dang bcas rnams kyi
rkyen dang bar chad thams cad zhi ba dang
chos dang srid kyi 'byor ba ma lus pa
rtag tu phyogs bcur rgyas pa'i 'phrin las mdzod
dpal ldan rdo rje gdan gyi byang gi phyogs
bod yul sa yi thig le yar klungs kyi
dge mtshan bcu dang ldan pa yul gyi gru
lha yi 'jig rten dang mtshungs 'phyos lung gi
byang ri rab brtan lhun po brtsegs pa'i rtser
gser gyi khang brtsegs pho brang dam pa nas
sangs rgyas bstan pa srung ba'i bstan srung mchog
chos mdzad bu bzhin skyong ba'i dam tshig can
nag phyogs phye mar 'thag pa'i mthu rtsal can
dpal ldan 'phyos lha 'khor bcas gnas 'dir gshegs
mdun gyi nam mkhar 'ja' tshon gur khyim dbus
ting 'dzin pir gyis bris pa'i gzhal yas su
mchog tu dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs 'dzum dang bcas
grangs med 'khor tshogs dang bcas bzhugs su gsol
stong gsum khyon ltar rin cen snod yangs su
ri ltar spungs pa'i dam rdzas gtor ma 'di
oM AH hUM gis bdud rtsir byin brlabs nas
dgra lha gnyan po 'khor dang bcas la 'bul
gzhan yang dngos su bshams dang yid kyis sprul
dgyes pa'i mchod sprin spyan gzigs nam mkha'i khams
yongs su gang ba sngags dang phyag rgya yis
byin gyis brlabs nas dgyes pa bskyed phyir 'bul
gser gyi 'od ris 'khrigs pa'i snod mchog tu
legs par gtams pa'i gser skyems dam pa dang
ro brgya'i dpal 'dzin ja dkar btung ba sogs
yid 'ong mchod pa'i sprin gyis khyod la mchod
rlung ltar mgyogs pa'i cang shes chibs su chibs
gangs ri ltar dkar dpa' zhing rab tu brjid
dran pa tsam gyis zhi rgyas dbang drag gi
phrin las tshul bzhin sgrub mdzad khyod la bstod
lha chen 'khor dang bcas pa khyed rnams kyis
dgyes pa'i mchod gtor dam rdzas 'di bzhes la
yul gyi phyogs 'dir nad rigs bzhi brgya sogs
nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad med par mdzod
rtag tu lo legs char chu dus su 'bab
mi phyugs rab 'phel bde skyid phun tshogs kun
yul gyi phyogs 'dir rtag tu rgyas pa dang
phun tshogs thams cad dbang du bsdu bar mdzod
log par 'khu ba'i sems ldan dgra dang bgegs
yul phyogs gang na gnas pa thams cad kyang
ltas dang cho 'phrul sogs kyis spa bkong la
skad cig nyid la brlag pa'i 'phrin las mdzod
mdor na sngon tshe slob dpon chen po yis
ji ltar bka' bsgos dam la bzhag pa bzhin
bcol ba'i 'phrin las thams cad sgrub pa la
nam yang g.yel ba med pa'i gnyer mdzod cig
yid 'ong mdzes pa'i chu skyes sdong po las
legs 'khrungs rgyal dbang padma 'byung gnas zhes
'gro la grags pa'i ba dang ches dkar ba
srid gsum 'byung po kun la mnga' mdzad cing
khyad par bod kyi lha srin ma lus pa
khyod kyi bka' la gnas so yud tsam gyis
mgon khyod bdag gi snying la sa ma dzaH
lhun po'i lho phyogs dpal ldan 'dzam bu'i gling
rgyal ba stong gis chos 'khor bskor ba'i gnas
gang de'i byang phyogs kha ba'i sa 'dzin gyis
yongs su bskor ba bod yul zhes bya ba'i
sa yi thig le lta bu yar klungs zhes
mtho ris grong gi mdzes pa las rgyal ba
chos dang srid kyi phun tshogs ji snyed pa
gang la brten pas sa gzhi la gnas kyang
'chi med dbang po'i gnas su brtag bya ba
gang de chos bzhin skyong ba'i mthu bo che
sangs rgyas bstan pa srung ba'i dam tshig can
nag phyogs phye mar 'thag pa'i mthu rtsal can
'phrin las gzugs su ston pa 'phyos lha zhes
grags pa'i pho nya srid rtse'i mthar 'gro ba
lha khyod spyan 'dren da lta gnas 'dir gshegs
rab brtan phun tshogs lha yi ri bo'i ngos
rin cen khang bzang shel gyi ba gam can
nyams dga' 'ja' 'od 'khyil ba'i pho brang nas
'khor dang bcas pa da lta gnas 'dir spyon
nam mkha' me yi 'od kyis 'gengs pa bzhin
bar snang glog gi phreng ba 'khrigs pa bzhin
nag phyogs phye mar 'thag la gnam lcags bzhin
rings par tshur spyon gnas 'dir brtan par bzhugs
ha ri tsan dan ga bur dzA ti sogs
dri zhim spos kyi dud sprin mkha' lam khyab
yid 'ong lha yi gos kyi bla re bres
mdzes pa'i ba dan dar 'phan 'ja' tshon ltar
ches cher bkra bas bar snang khyab par dkrigs
phyogs kun dal gyis dgod pa'i 'brug sgra bzhin
snyan brjid rol mo'i sgra yis sa chen g.yo
rin cen snod du legs gtams ro brgya pa'i
myos byed bdud rtsi'i btung ba mtsho ltar bskyil
'chi med bdud rtsi'i chus bran zhal zas kyi
bshos bu dkar dmar ri rab bas kyang mtho
rin cen tshogs dang go khrab bzhon pa sogs
mdzes pa'i spyan gzigs sa dang bar snang gang
ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs pa'i
dgyes pa'i mchod gtor rab 'byams zhing gi khyon
yongs su gang ba dgra lha 'khor bcas la
gsol lo mchod do dgyes bzhin bzhes su gsol
khyod sku rab dkar gangs kyi ri bo bzhin
stong phrag nyi ma'i 'od zer rnam par 'phro
mkha' la sprin dkar g.yo ba'i rnam pa can
cang shes bzhon pas rnam rol khyod la bstod
rin cen rgyan phreng g.yo ba'i mdzes sdug can
dar dkar na bza' gsar pa'i lhab lhub dang
gser gyi ska rags nor bu'i lan tshar can
rnam thos bu yi mdzes 'phrog khyod la bstod
drag tu khros tshe nor bu'i go khrab can
lhab lhub ba dan g.yo ba'i mdung rnon gyis
dgra bgegs phye mar 'thag pa'i drag shul can
dpa' ba'i dpung tshogs dang bcas khyod la bstod
dam can srung ma 'khor bcas khyed rnams kyis
dgyes pa'i mchod gtor rgya mtsho 'di bzhes la
yul gyi phyogs 'dir rdzogs ldan dus bzhin du
chos dang srid kyi 'byor pa rgyas par mdzod
khyad par bdag cag mi nor 'khor dang bcas
lha mchog khyod la deng nas gnyer zhing gtad
nyin gsum bya ra nam yang ma g.yel cig
mtshan gsum mel tshe nam yang ma g.yel cig
nag phyogs dgra bgegs thams cad tshar chod la
tshe dang bsod nams dpal dang 'byor pa dang
rigs rgyud mnga' 'bangs snyan pa'i grags pa sogs
ji ltar 'dod pa'i don kun yid bzhin sgrubs
